media:group.media:title: Hereâ€™s Why Mallorca Is For More Than Just Road Cycling!
media:group.media:description:
Mallorca is famed for its smooth roads and epic climbs, making it ideal for a road cycling paradise! But recently people have been discovering that there's a whole new dimension to Mallorca, and that's its gravel riding scene. Manon and GCN en EspaÃ±ol's Bernat meet up with ex-pro Jan Eric Schwarzer, who shows them around a local gravel route displaying the best bits of Mallorca's final cycling frontier.
